name: Living Dead - AR
description:
Living Dead Augmented Reality (AR) game is implemented to work on the android devices. Which has two different modes (Hand Gesture Shooting Mode & Weapon Shooting mode) just created to Entertain and Burst the stress of the users. More than making fun, AR Games are used for rehabilitation purposes. When It comes to Hand Gesture based AR games, There are very few chances of “Gesture Detection” success rate. To overcome this problem, The performance of this game is Boosted & Optimized smoothly and very less amount of bugs to be found. When it comes to accuracy, it never fails to detect our hand gesture unless and until our hands are not shown in the camera properly, The overall Accuracy of Hand gesture detection is 85%.

NOTE : This game works only on AR core supported android devices.

Check out for your device here : https://developers.google.com/ar/devices

GAME INSTRUCTIONS : 

COMPETITIVE MODE

--> USE PISTOL & RIFLE TO SHOOT THE ZOMBIES BY CLICKING SHOOT BUTTON.

--> THIS MODE IS TO EXPERIENCE THE SCARIEST ZOMBIE SURVIVAL.

--> YOU CAN WALK ON VIRTUAL WORLD TO ESCAPE FROM THE ZOMBIE BITES.

--> FINISH ALL THE WAVES WITHOUT DYING TO WIN THE GAME! YAY - LETS GO!

FREE KILL MODE

--> USE GRAB & RELEASE GESTURE TO SHOOT THE ZOMBIES WITH FIREBALL. 

--> THIS MODE IS TO PRACTICE ZOMBIE SURVIVAL

--> NO HEALTH, NO WAVES, ONLY FREE KILLS

--> YAY! ENJOY
